Articles.Content:
Hello all, 

Although i have been in the forums for quite a long time, i haven't actually introduced myself properly. I'm younger than most people here  but i do im not the youngest. you might have seen me around on the forums quite a lot and that is because i always go on the forums, no matter  what situation i'm in (i even go on it via my kindle).  i really like playing with karkens and crashing ksp. i am pretty sure that if i haven't deleted all of my crash files, the size of it will be just as big as the ksp folder itself. i also like making youtube videos (if you click on the link under in my signatures box, it will take u there).

Things i love:

  • spaceX
  • rocket science 
  • ksp
  • kerbals
  • krakens
  • computer
  • engineering
  • Falcon Heavys
  • my mouse(for my computer)
  • my pet mouse(not 4 my computer)
  • ksp forums
  • interesting challenges 
  • matt lowne(ksp youtuber)
Edited September 28, 2016 by Red Iron Crown

Hello TheGuyNamedAlan!

I like the list of things you love.  Glad to have you aboard.


Happy landings!

@TheGuyNamedAlan I didn't know you did YT videos! I must watch them...

Oh my gosh. The floppy fish rocket in "Hunting for Kraken... had be busting up laughing, and you actually caught a Kraken! I've never tried fishing for Kraken with floppy joints, it's quite a keen idea. Well done and great use of music! Also, I'm happy to see you mastered the other demon that haunts me... docking.

Looking forward to your next
